response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which we believe holds immense value for you. Given its significance and the impact it could have on your endeavors, we propose a special offer. We are extending the opportunity to acquire this product at a price of $950,000. This offer reflects our commitment to making such exceptional products accessible while ensuring a fair return for us. We trust that you will find this proposal attractive and look forward to discussing how this product can elevate your business or personal goals.", "product_price": 950000}
